ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_OMINOUS_ORBITER_RUMOR_TE: The Nomai named Ping has noticed a strange alien vessel orbiting a pulsar in the distance.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_OMINOUS_ORBITER_EXPLORE_: I made it inside the alien ship. It appears to be eerie, yet humble.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_EXHIBIT_ROOMS_KAV_EXPLOR: I may have found an exhibition dedicated to the species who built this ship.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_CRYSTAL_PROXIMITY_TEXT: When I approached a floating crystal, I learned how to read two new languages!
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_CRYSTAL_PICKUP_TEXT: I can also pick up the crystal.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_EXHIBIT_ROOMS_STR_EXPLOR: I found an exhibition dedicated to the Stranger's Inhabitants.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_ARTIFACT_PICKUP_TEXT: I found an early artifact replica in the Inhabitant exhibit.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_EXHIBIT_ROOMS_NOM_EXPLOR: I found an exhibition dedicated to the Nomai.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_TRACTORBEAM_PICKUP_TEXT: I found a tractor beam replica in the Nomai exhibit.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_EXHIBIT_ROOMS_HEA_EXPLOR: I found an exhibition dedicated to us Hearthians. Somehow, it still feels foreign.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_MARSHMALLOWS_PICKUP_TEXT: I found what looked like a can of marshmallows.
I tasted one of the marshmallows. Tastes like a bad batch of Porphy's xxx super Sap-Wine.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_DIORAMA_DOOR_RUMOR_TEXT: The wall at the back is noticeably different from the others. In front of it are four pedestals, each with eye-like symbols on it.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_DIORAMA_DOOR_SOLVED_TEXT: Placing down an item from each exhibit on the pedestals opens a new room.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_DIORAMA_ROOM_RUMOR_TEXT: The wall swung open to reveal a room behind it.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_DIORAMA_ROOM_EXPLORE_TEX: There are four dioramas inside this room. They appear to be based on the same four species of the exhibits.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_DIORAMA_ROOM_MINIATURE_T: I can jump inside the dioramas! It feels as if I have been shrunk...
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_CODED_DOORS_STRHOUSE_RUM: I found a symbol within an oddly designed house in the Inhabitant diorama.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_CODED_DOORS_SCOUT_RUMOR_: I found a signal with a peculiar name within the dioramas.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_CODED_DOORS_KAVHOUSE_EXP: A message in one of the houses in the Karvi diorama hints that an Inhabitant code is usually five symbols long.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_REEL_HOUSE_EXPLORE_TEXT: There is a code totem locking the entrance to the big house in the Inhabitant diorama.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_REEL_HOUSE_ENTER_TEXT: The big house is a reel house. There are shelves and a space to watch Inhabitant reels.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_REEL_HOUSE_BUKRAD_TEXT: I found a story that does not make much sense that explain why there are no reels on the shelves.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_SLIDE_REEL_RUMOR_TEXT: I found a reel in the collapsed tower.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_SLIDE_REEL_WATCH_TEXT: A slide reel depicts a boat pole being used to ignite unlit torches.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_INHABITANT_TOWER_COLLAPS: The shuttle I launched collided with the tower in the other diorama!
I can access the top room of the tower after knocking the whole structure down.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_NOMAI_CANON_EXPLORE_TEXT: A gravity cannon sits atop a structure in the Nomai Diorama.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_NOMAI_CANNON_NOPOWER_TEX: I pressed the launch button but nothing happened. I think there is no power.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_NOMAI_CANNON_POWERED_TEX: I restored the power by placing the crystal on a pedestal near the cannon.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_FOURTH_QUANTUM_RULE_EXPL: A fourth quantum rule states that a non-quantum item occupying the same space as a quantum socket can make it impossible for a quantum object to collapse on that socket.

It is possible for a quantum object not to collapse onto any given socket at all. Conversely, manipulating a quantum object through the fourth quantum rule can force it to occupy a new quantum socket that the object would otherwise 'refuse' to collapse onto.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_QUANTUM_GEYSERS_EXPLORE_: There is a quantum geyser in the Hearthian exhibit hopping between rings of stone in the river
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_QUANTUM_GEYSERS_FILLSOCK: I am able to place down items atop rings of stone marked along the river.
When the geyser is completely blocked from the river, it is forced onto the mountain.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_GHOST_MATTER_CAVE_EXPLOR: I found a cave barricaded by a dense field of ghost matter. Entering it by conventional means is likely fatal.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_GHOST_MATTER_CAVE_GEYSER: When on the mountain, the geyser is pointing directly at the cave.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_GHOST_MATTER_CAVE_ENTER_: I made it past the ghost matter with the aid of a collapsed quantum geyser.
I am soaked wet. Even when no longer sprayed by the geyser it is enough to nullify the ghost matter for just a bit of time.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_FELDSPAR_MYTH_RUMOR_TEXT: There is a recorder in the cave.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_FELDSPAR_MYTH_EXPLORE_TE: The Karvi wrote a fictional story about our pioneer pilot escaping from a deep hole by using a Nomai tractor beam that was powered by a light sensor in a nearby observatory.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_SCOUT_SIGNAL_EXPLORE_TEX: An abandoned scout in the Hearthian Diorama is emiting on a precise frequency.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_BROKEN_SCOUTS_CODE_RUMOR: There are several signals around the dioramas echoing on the new frequency.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_BUILDING_RUMOR_T: There is a dormant volcano in the Karvi diorama. I can enter the central chamber and see an opening high above, but my jetpack is not powerful enough to carry me there due to a gravitational anomaly.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_BUILDING_TRACTOR: I placed the frame of a tractor beam at the center of the volcano cave and powered it through the light sensor nearby. I can now ascend to the building at the top.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_BUILDING_DOOR_TE: There is a code totem inside the building atop the mountain.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_SUMMIT_RUMOR_TEX: Using the odd signal names, I managed to crack the code and get to the other side of the door.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_SUMMIT_REEL_RUMO: A slide reel showed a strange hallway with unlit torches.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_SUMMIT_EXPLORE_T: I found a dark hallway inside the building atop the mountain in the Karvi Exhibit.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_VOLCANO_SUMMIT_IGNITE_TE: I used the pole to ignite an unlit torch.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_PHOSPHORUS_RUMOR_TEXT: Lighting all the torches activated a beam further up still.
ShipLogDictionary.$COSMICCURATORS_PHOSPHORUS_EXPLORE_TEXT: I met a living Karvi named Phosphorous!
